lyric_statuses.text: Forming empires in the shade of trees
lyric_statuses.attribution: "Running with the Boys" (Midnight Machines version) by Lights

lyric_statuses.text: Bad ideas, ay / I know where they lead
I'm stayin' up too late just so I can stay awake
You think that I could sense a trend
Good at overthinking with my heart / How you even think it got this far?
I'm gonna need something to hold on to
lyric_statuses.attribution: "Something to Hold on To" by Emily Warren

lyric_statuses.text: Do I make you wanna dance real slow / Go flyin' down a two-lane road
lyric_statuses.attribution: "Do I Make You Wanna" by Billy Currington

lyric_statuses.text: I got my coffee, Sunday, New York Times / Little piece of paradise
Always dreamed of kicking down the door / What were you waiting for?
It looks a little rough, but it runs okay
